title: Darkin Question's
body:
1) What happens if I throw them into the void
2) the four horseman of the darkin vs Nagakabouros
3) would lux's light affect them at all?
4) Do they have a healing factor? I assume yes
5) when will we get a Darkin Apocalypse?

replies.body:
1) I imagine the same thing that would happen if anything else entered the Void - they would be instantly unmade.
2) This doesn't seem to be a question...
3) Lux's magic? Yes.
4) I mean... yes? They are fallen god-warriors. Probably easier to just consume the host and find a new one, though!

5) Are you that eager for Runeterra to end, and all storytelling and gameplay along with it? OKAY! Bultz requested it, everyone, that's what we're going to do!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

To be clear - the story of Runeterra is not expressed in games of League. The MOBA is a battle fantasy using characters from the world/setting, and storytelling is not suited to being handled within the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9lsvgAWz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-20T18:46:34.315+0000)
>
> 1) I imagine the same thing that would happen if anything else entered the Void - they would be instantly unmade.
> 2) This doesn't seem to be a question...
> 3) Lux's magic? Yes.
> 4) I mean... yes? They are fallen god-warriors. Probably easier to just consume the host and find a new one, though!
> 
> 5) Are you that eager for Runeterra to end, and all storytelling and gameplay along with it? OKAY! Bultz requested it, everyone, that's what we're going to do!
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Wait I thought gameplay of LoL isn't conected to the lore.. unless you're talking about something else... hmmm.... HMMMMMM

Further question.  Since the Aspect of Twilight can teleport across the entire galaxy and seemed to have been instrumental in turning the Darkin into weapons, why didn't she just teleport them into a black hole?

What about the void lords? What happens if the Darkin meets the old gods, would they control them like N'zoth controlling Lissandra? What happens now that Aatrox stab his giant sword into Runeterra? Is Runeterra a dormant Aspect?

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9lsvgAWz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-20T18:46:34.315+0000)
>
> 1) I imagine the same thing that would happen if anything else entered the Void - they would be instantly unmade.

Cool, I thought because the exposure to the void might have been the catalyst for their Darkin transformation, then perhaps more would cause them to become whole or become stronger.

> 2) This doesn't seem to be a question...

The question is this, Nagakabouros, who is a supposed "god" vs "god warriors" or the remains of them, who is stronger and what is the concussions of the term "god" in all of the lore?

> 3) Lux's magic? Yes.

Not specifically the magic, but the fact that it is light. Does that affect them? Darkin, sort of demonic beings vs light, the accustomed herald of good. 

> 4) I mean... yes? They are fallen god-warriors. Probably easier to just consume the host and find a new one, though!

A healing factor like Venom has from the movie where it is instant, or does it take them time to heal?
 
> 5) Are you that eager for Runeterra to end, and all storytelling and gameplay along with it? OKAY! Bultz requested it, everyone, that's what we're going to do!
> 

https://classywithatwist.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/anchorman1.gif?w=558

lol Finally someone agrees! Yes I would like to see another Darkin Arise and a new event of epic proportion which is just a giant war of 4 Darkin players vs the masses.

1) Considering the fact the Void feed on magic, it would likely consume them.
2) Unlikely as Naga seems god status and would kill them.
3) Yes, it does damage, doesn't it?
4) I presume the healing they have is a form of the blood magic they mention.
5) With only 3 dudes in malformed bodies against gods and armies of Runeterra? They'd lose.

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9lsvgAWz,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-06-18T19:13:15.394+0000)
>
> 1) What happens if I throw them into the void
> 2) the four horseman of the darkin vs Nagakabouros
> 3) would lux's light affect them at all?
> 4) Do they have a healing factor? I assume yes
> 5) when will we get a Darkin Apocalypse?


Opinion:

2.)  Naga. They're not demons or horsemen. They aren't even spirits. They're rogue ascended warriors.

3.)  I don't think its a weakness at all. The darkin are not immune to magic, so it can probably damage them though.

4.)  In the lore they healed their regular bodies using blood magic, but I think Scathlocke is saying that it isn't instant like you see in anime. Aatrox sees the bodies he takes as a mockery to his original form, so that makes me think he (or the others) wont care for their vessels the same way they once cared for themselves unless they have to.
My favorite darkin theory is my own theory that fishbones is a darkin who wants to be good but jinx is crazy and trying to recorrupt him, and all the talking is real

1. Tbh no clue
2. Naga easy. Naga is the closest thing we have to an actual God in lore.
3. Hahahhahahahahahahaha no. 
4. Yes, through absorbing bodies (Aatrox) as well as them possesing the weilder of the weapon (does that count?)
5. Tbh prob never. The Darkins are powerfull but there are plently of bigger threats as well as people capable of beating them
